title: The Decay of Lying - "Fortunately, in England"

content.question: The primary rhetorical function of the sentence "Fortunately, in England, at any rate, thought is not catching" (paragraph 4) is to

choices.label: introduce a digression from the central topic
introduce an exception to a general rule
provide supporting evidence for a previously stated thesis

content.answer: introduce a digression from the central topic

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
